lender.name: Florentine
lender.occupation: Him: Architecture Grad Student; Her: RN
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Sina
lender.loan_because: i care.

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: It makes such an impact.
lender.occupational_info: Enabling poor people earn a living, so they can feed, cloth and educate themselves.

lender.name: Sunita
lender.loan_because: it makes the most sense to me...the stories of the power of microloans are truly phenomenal and, to me, seem like the best way to put my money to use.
lender.occupational_info: I help the urban school district in Chicago get better through providing money to promising programs and initiatives.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I study drought and fire history.

lender.name: Dan
lender.occupational_info: I make computer programs

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who are already making an effort.
lender.occupational_info: I help adults with disabilities, like in wheelchairs, and developmental disabilities (retarded), in a day program

lender.name: Aaron
lender.occupational_info: I\'m in my last year of High-School (secondary school) and plan on attending university next year, hopefully studying Theatre and Performance Studies

lender.name: RICHARD
lender.loan_because: I would like to think I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help defendants addicted to controlled substances become sober, avoid prison, and have their criminal cases dismissed.

lender.name: Robert Bruce
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do for those less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: retired international marketing exec

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't I? KIVA is an amazing organization. One person can and does make a difference and that person changes so much for so many. I'm fortunate to have this opportunity to share what is equally "ours".

lender.name: George and Patricia
lender.loan_because: We can see we have the ability to make someones life better with very little effort on our part. We live in the richest nation on earth and we want to help people from some of the poorest.
lender.occupational_info: My wife works for a group of Doctors and I am a disabled business owner.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference - too often governments get in the way. This seems very real and forward thinking to me.
lender.occupational_info: Our health center gives medical care to people who cannot afford it. Also, my wife and I run an organic farm.

lender.name: Family Law Group
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of attorneys, paralegals, legal assistants and a file clerk working in the family law department of a Seattle law firm. From your friends: Darla, Jake, Laura, Lisa, Llewelyn, Misty, Ray, Rebecca, Sarah and Tia.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I have always been a humanitarian. I try my hardest to give back to the people of this world. I have lived in poverty for apart of my life, and at my family\'s lowest point people always helped out with whatever they could. That is what drives me to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in a University.

lender.name: syler
lender.loan_because: we all should
lender.occupational_info: I analyze disputes and do legal research and writing.

lender.name: jane
lender.loan_because: It\'s Christmas and my sister and I thought it would be good to lend the money instead of buying Christmas presents. So happy Christmas.

lender.name: Jim
lender.occupational_info: I work in HIV/AIDS vaccine research, and I am an amateur photographer.

lender.name: Gina Soileau
lender.loan_because: To help people around the world better their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Anna GV AZ
lender.loan_because: I'm making Kiva my savings account. The interest I earn is human energy and better lives for others. A way to save while helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I live on a small farm. I am retired and garden and care for animals.

lender.name: Maddie & Pete
lender.loan_because: We believe in social justice, the dignity of work, and standing together. We love the opportunity to work with others through KIVA!

lender.name: Kristi Jordan
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I raise the next generation.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: Being a single mother with a daughter. I understand the day to day struggles and stress...If I can do one thing to reduces that overwhelming feeling for one day, it\'s all worth it.

lender.name: Nigel and Laura
lender.loan_because: I think this is an absolutely wonderful way to encourage others who, without Kiva, would continue to struggle.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: many people have helped me too.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations imrove their busineeses.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I wish to help those in need through assisting them in commerce and trade in their respective area of business around the world.\r\n\"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.\" - Chinese Proverb
lender.occupational_info: I am currently an undergraduate business student at the University of Toronto.

lender.name: Lynda Haddon
lender.occupational_info: I provide classes and support to women and their partners expecting twins, triplets or more. I also provide support for parents of multiple births who have experienced loss of a fetus or child.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am a neighbour

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I'm self employed with my own screenprinting business. I had money lent to me to start up so why shouldn't other people have the same opportunity as I did?
lender.occupational_info: We print the works of local artists onto t-shirts for sale in our shop and for wholesale.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women empower themselves to have a new life.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can\'t help but be convinced that this is the right way to do international development. One person at a time.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I was watching the news on the CBC here in Canada and they were talking about this Kiva and I thought it was a great idea. I remember when I started my first business when I was in university and it helped me develop my own business skills. I received a loan from the provincial government--interest free. I just think it is great helping other people getting their own businesses going.
lender.occupational_info: I was in the corporate world for over a decade, and always had a passion for photography and filmmaking. Now, I am an independent filmmaker working on my first feature film.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and realize that understanding lenders are not easily found, especially when dealing with banks.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a country Inn and Spa along with my wife and step-son. I also write food and travel articles for two magazines.

lender.name: Heather, Mika & Ian
lender.loan_because: We are glad to be able to help other families a bit. We have been lucky to have family and friends assist us in difficult times, and love the idea of participating in a world community.

lender.name: Kenton and Erin
lender.loan_because: We heard about Kiva on TV and decided to get involved to personally make a difference for others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We were married in June 2006 and are working in Calgary, Alberta - Kenton at an auto repair dealership and Erin at a greenhouse.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It is a way for me to do something directly.
lender.occupational_info: I teach social work in university and train health and social service workers.

lender.name: Grant and Amy
lender.loan_because: We believe in the entreprenurial spirit and that small businesses drive the local economy. We are so fortunate to be in the position to loan and make a difference in other parts of the world.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to help other people who are less fortunate than I to have a better life. I think this is a great idea and I hope more of my friends will also get involved.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired but recently have worked with youth from the ages between 13 and 16 who have difficulty coping in the regular school environment. I worked in what is called an \"Alternative School\", with students who come from diverse backgrounds, who may have learning, social and behavioral issues to deal with. They are great kids!

lender.name: Loch
lender.loan_because: I feel this is one of the best ways to encourage sustainable development, and I like family run agricultural projects because they help a country to become food sufficient which is the first priority. A country that can feed itself can develop other industries.
lender.occupational_info: Presently I work at an alternate school in British Columbia. In the past I worked as a WUSC volunteer teacher in Lesotho, southern Africa, and on a Dene reserve in northern Alberta.

lender.name: Darrell
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do..

lender.name: Enid
lender.loan_because: I have great admiration for people who are willing to try to make their lives better,in spite of great adversity.

lender.name: Pierre-Andre
lender.loan_because: I invest in people. We share one planet.
lender.occupational_info: System admin, DBA, Devp

lender.name: Holly & Chris
lender.occupation: just a couple of compassionate beings
lender.loan_because: there\'s no reason not to!
lender.occupational_info: we love to use our hands, to create and to nurture. we\'re always learning and always sharing.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who are working hard to get ahead in life despite some adverse conditions. I also think I will get my money back which can be recycled to another borrower.
lender.occupational_info: business & economic development

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than us to improve the quality of life for those people with initiative but lack the funds to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but am involved as a business consultant

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.occupation: operations manager for green development firm

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: It is my small contribution to international goodwill.
lender.occupational_info: Generally making myself useful.

lender.name: Michael and Kate
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the capital markets in Canada.

lender.name: Maryse
lender.loan_because: I loan because I should and because it gives me great pleasure.
lender.occupational_info: I take people to countries they've dreamt of discovering; I take them on vacations during which they hopefully get acquainted with the history, culture and people of these great countries. I am blessed with a fantastic job, in which I see the world and meet some fantastic people.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It costs me basically nothing, while it is immensely rewarding to others in greater need.

lender.name: The Bryson Family
lender.loan_because: The world will change for the better not by acts of governments but from the small actions of thousands of the nameless faceless individuals acting collectively for humanity.

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: It feels great to give a hand up and not a hand out. It helps build peoples self esteem and contributes to their independence.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Director of Marketing for a retail chain of gasoline/convenience stores.

lender.name: Dugey
lender.loan_because: I hope that helping the lenders to be successful in their businesses will provide security for their families and will also have a positive effect on their communities as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Policy and Compliance Analyst with the City of Toronto's Corporate Access and Privacy Office.

lender.name: Nico
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to some of the places that kiva operates in and have seen that small amounts of money matter.
lender.occupational_info: I help people use computers.

lender.name: Martin & Marie
lender.loan_because: These folks are trying to better their lives and the lives of their families. I can't imagine better people to help.
lender.occupational_info: Working now with computer systems and no longer in the Police Force. Sometimes that's a good thing, sometimes it's not!

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: KIVA is fantastic idea and a great way to keep your initial 25 dollars going and going, helping more and more people.
lender.occupational_info: Recruit volunteers and manage the office for a non-profit organization.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with family, friends and adequate wealth. There is no reason why others shouldn't have the same opportunities in life, especially when they are willing to work hard for them.
lender.occupational_info: I used to help people make sure that their money is used in ways to protect themselves and their families and to help them thrive.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it takes money to make money. It's a small thing I can do to believe in someone's ambition to support their family and help them foster their livelihood.
lender.occupational_info: health care industry for people with diabetes

lender.name: Jan and Eileen
lender.loan_because: It may enhance the local economy in a self-sustaining way

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: People need to support people

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I think there\'s a kind of romance to the idea that amounts of money that seem small to those of us in rich countries can change the lives of people not fortunate enough to have been born with the kind of opportunities I take for granted.\r\n\r\nSo sharing what opportunity I can with a few people who can use it seems like a good thing to do with what I can spare.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, essentially my job is to provide much of the training materials necessary for workers in the oil industry to stay safe at work.\r\n\r\nA lot of my job also involves paperwork for injured workers, and newsletters about current risks.

lender.name: Irungu
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing in a world that has often gone wrong.
lender.occupational_info: Secondary school teacher in the field of Humanities.

lender.name: Paul Smerdon
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world for the better.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get a bank to believe that you are capable of repaying a loan. It is very frustrating when you are trying to better yourself and no-one will lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I provide clientele and staff with comprehensive product knowledge for a full range of beverage alcohol products

lender.name: The Riley/Sterns
lender.loan_because: We help ourselves by helping others.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Where else can you do so much good for so little?

lender.name: Robert H
lender.loan_because: This program looks more like a 'teach a man to fish' strategy than a 'give a man a fish' handout.
lender.occupational_info: creating & managing computer networks for small businesses.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have been helped by others in the past. It brings me great joy to be able to offer some small help now.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange benefits for people who are injured in workplaces

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: My motto is if you give a man a fish you feed him for a day. If you teach a man to fish you will feed him for a life time. But if you lend a man the money to buy a net and a set up a fish selling business you will lift his family out of poverty.

lender.name: Doug and Cindy
lender.loan_because: We're so glad that I saw Kiva on a CBC news telecast. It is something we have been looking to find something like this for quite awhile. To be able to help others yet have them proud of their accomplishments because they have earned them without handouts.
lender.occupational_info: When you look at what we have readily available to us each and every day, we should feel an obligation to help out others who do not have these oportunities, so that they may better themselves and their family.

lender.name: Leone
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are trying hard to get ahead. The KIVA program seems a good way for people to help others reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are in our eighties and are enjoying quiet retirement from the stresses of a work-a-day world. Our health is good and we are thankful for our blessings.

lender.name: Andrea and Phil
lender.loan_because: We can make someone's life a little better.
lender.occupational_info: Andrea works in an office and Phil pulls teeth.

lender.name: Seon
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to want to start up a business and lack Capital. What goes around surely come around. My Blessings equals your blessings
lender.occupational_info: I help people get out of debt reduce taxes and plan for retirement ...

lender.name: jaydee77ca
lender.occupational_info: Swirling round in this familiar parable. Spinning, weaving round each new experience. Recognize this as a holy gift and celebrate this chance to be alive and breathing.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I hope that my small loans will help people to make their life better.

lender.name: Roddy
lender.loan_because: helping people to help themselves is one of the reasons we\'re here on earth.
lender.occupational_info: I served as lawyer to local government (towns, cities, regional districts, villages) throughout British Columbia.

lender.name: Maury Dergousoff
lender.loan_because: The passion I see in the entrepreneur's on KIVA gives me renewed hope for the future.
lender.occupational_info: Improving business performance

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer. So sue me.

lender.name: Bhaskar
lender.loan_because: I am able to and I like the concept.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Compared to people in North America I'm not rich...compared to the people requesting help on Kiva...I must seem like a millionaire.
lender.occupational_info: I do contract work on environmental issues such as private sewage disposal, water supplies, contaminated sites and petroleum storage.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I Should

lender.name: Billie
lender.loan_because: This seems like a very practical way to help people who are willing to work hard but lack the resources to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for a large airline for many years. Now I work in my garden.

lender.name: jacqui
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people help themselves

lender.name: Studio 7 Designs Inc
lender.loan_because: We love to support entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Sustainable focused design company

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I think it\'s exciting to have an opportunity to make a positive difference someone\'s life. Especially someone who is working hard to better their life and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I own several commercial property maintenance businesses and I invest in real estate.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world! Is that too much to ask? I'm sick of corporate control, of the IMF and the World Bank, and the greedy soulless suits who run them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large book store in a city of 50,000 people. I don't make a lot of money - but happiness is more important than riches. My favourite books are non-fiction; history, political science, environment, cultural studies and philosophy. I have a university degree in English literature as well - helps sell books!

lender.name: Jamie & Amie
lender.loan_because: We realize that we live a privileged life here in North America and lending a little of the money we have allows people to improve their lives. We risk such a small amount to give the chance of a large return.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites for people and ministries such as orphanages, etc. all around the world.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: a little money from me can make a big difference to people looking to improve their lives.

lender.name: Guy-Gabriel
lender.loan_because: I think it ia a very good way to help people in need to develop a successful business and to help them and their family. More people should get involved.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people who are working hard to improve their lives and the lives of their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am training to be a hospital chaplain.

lender.name: syed hassan
lender.loan_because: i want to devolap my work to the other countries

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help media organisations to work out what direction they should follow, such as ways of increasing profitability, whether to invest in certain areas, or how to become more competitive

lender.name: Leslie Carl
lender.loan_because: My life is good.

lender.name: lance
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do, and I have been to the Philippines three times and know how difficult it is for Filipinos to find work. Often one, or even sometimes BOTH parents have to take jobs in other countries. Families are many times split up, and children are deprived of a father or mother in order for pesos to be sent back to support them. I want to do what I can to help Filipino families stay and earn money in the Philippines!!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to give a hand up to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make their homes more functional and attractive to live in. Offering full decorating services from new home construction to renovation, colour selection, and much more.

lender.name: Rud
lender.loan_because: It's a good feeling to help others and the cost is minimal for me on my pension

lender.name: Michal
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: The best description you can find when visiting my web site.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: It feels great to give something back..

lender.name: harry
lender.loan_because: There is a need
lender.occupational_info: I talk to people who are troubled and try to help them find ways to cope with their difficulties.

lender.name: Sherrie
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us, so we want to do good for others.\r\n\"There but for the grace of God go I\"
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse\r\nI have four sons and I gandson\r\nI am married

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people in even a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the photo industry.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Laura & Steve
lender.occupational_info: Steve teaches physical activity and sports to high-school students. I legally represent injured workers as they fight to get the compensation they deserve.

lender.name: Paul & Andrew
lender.loan_because: We are no longer making loans as we are fundamentally opposed to US loans as there are so many opportunities for funding outside this system. Kiva represented more to us and our philosophy is not helping North American society which has many resources upon which to draw. Our solution would have been for Kiva to establish a separate organization for this purpose or to work with one of many organizations already making small business loans rather than establish more overhead.

lender.name: Tejeet
lender.loan_because: I am doing my part to make a difference.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I am to love my neighbor as myself

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I like to make friends around the world

lender.name: Percy
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to spread good-will and give people a hand-up. I would like to share with those who have not had the same oppotunities as I have had.
lender.occupational_info: Being retired means that I have worked many many years, and now I can live on savings and pensions.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to change a life for the better.... after my best friend Vinnie The Cat (pictured) passed away I realized life is precious and I just felt like helping in his honor.
lender.occupational_info: I help fix old pipe-organs and make them play like they were new.

lender.name: Janet, Peter, Emmet, Austin and Myles
Andre and Rosa
lender.loan_because: I can and I want my son Andre to experience the joy and fulfillment that you can get from sharing with others.
lender.occupational_info: The best inheritance that I can leave to my child

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: it seems like an intriguing alternative to regular charities. Definately worth a shot..
lender.occupational_info: I am a Filmmaker by passion. During the day I work with teenage students who are interested in things like film, theatre, art, and music.

lender.name: Cam & Melita
lender.loan_because: as we have travelled to some of these countries we have seen that the people who seem to have the least, are the most generous people of all.
lender.occupational_info: I manage computer systems for small and medium sized Energy companies.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to reach across the world and give another hard working person a chance to make their dreams come true.

lender.name: Mark and Heather
lender.loan_because: we all need a helping hand sometimes...

lender.name: Timothy Bahash
lender.loan_because: As hard as those less fortunate work to support themselves, those more fortunate must work to support them.

lender.name: jolene
lender.loan_because: Help women in Rwanda
lender.occupational_info: A writer and worker for peace

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I want to help women enterprenuers in other countries
lender.occupational_info: gardening, landscaping

lender.name: Rana and Yvan
lender.loan_because: We have the opportunity of owning a business and we know how satisfying the rewards are. We want to help empower someone to feel the same satisfaction who might not otherwise be able to.

lender.name: Jacquie
lender.loan_because: I am trying to make this life meaningful and do my part. My whole life I believed in what is fair and just - and this inequity in the developing world is not very fair or just. The living conditions are horrible for a human being, and 50,000 people a day are dying - if that happened in New York or Toronto or London - well, the rest of us would snap to attention in a hurry. I would like to help someone have the same chances that I have. I hope it helps.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a municipal government, providing administrative assistance for public works construction contracts.

lender.name: NELSON
lender.loan_because: i want to help as many people as i can. $25 can go a long way to help people and i am glad to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: i am a civil servant in alberta, canada.

lender.name: Don and Sue
lender.loan_because: We want to help people improve their lives and the lives of their families and communities.

lender.name: Roland & Mary Anne
lender.occupational_info: Owners of an independent CD & DVD retail store.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I think that it will make a difference. I was very fortunate to grow up in a country where it was relatively easy to start a business. I hope that we can create the same conditions everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I offer engineering services to clients in Canada. Primarily my work surrounds the control of processes using computers. A good example is the automatic controls surrounding a water treatment plant.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage small businesslikeours tosucceed
lender.occupational_info: I manage the internet site for The Bay Hammock company

lender.name: Dara
lender.occupational_info: Budget and Planning Manager for the International AIDS Vaccine Initiative (IAVI)

lender.name: Denny
lender.loan_because: helping others help themselves is the way of making a better life for people.
lender.occupational_info: I am an aviation historian

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupation: Case Manager with Big Brother Big Sisters

lender.name: Katie and family
lender.loan_because: We\'ve all heard \"give a man a fish -feed a man, teach a man to fish -feed a villiage\" These loans are like that. They compound the benefits to many.

lender.name: Bill & Judy
lender.loan_because: Bill and I see this as an opportunity for a small amount of money to make a world of difference.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired but active in the community, particulary drama and singing.

lender.name: Changeways Clinic
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of supporting people in pursuit of their own goals.
lender.occupational_info: We are psychologists (eventually I may get a photo of us all together) specializing in the treatment of anxiety and depression. We develop materials and therapy protocols and provide training programs for other mental health professionals in Canada and elsewhere.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.occupational_info: I train people to catalyze social and environmental change - Conservation International (www.conservation.org).

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Since I learned about the concept of microfinancing, I have been looking for a way to become involved at a personal level. I have travelled throughout South America and to the Phillipines and I have seen the incredible impact of very small businesses have on the lives of individuals and their communities. I have been involved in some microbusiness development in my home city as well.
lender.occupational_info: I give people access to lawyers and legal services through a small monthly membership fee. We legally empower people to make access to legal resources by decreasing the financial barrier to our services.

lender.name: Kim's Kids
lender.loan_because: we started loaning as part of a Christmas project. In 2006, we took 1/2 of our personal Christmas spending money to get started. We wanted to help people in other areas of the world who are struggling.

lender.name: Greg & family
lender.loan_because: Loans should be based on the character of the person behind the enterprise, and not by the size of their asset base.
lender.occupational_info: Construction Project management.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: What is a great deal of money to these entrepreneurs is very little to me. If I can help someone who wishes to help themselves, how can I refuse?

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I think it is very important that we help those who help themselves.

lender.name: Station Square
lender.loan_because: Feels good to help in some small way

lender.name: Malcolm
lender.loan_because: To give a helping hand is so much more worthwhile than a giving a hand out. A much more dignified way of improving the world.
lender.occupational_info: Protecting power stations from fire.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: i would like to see poverty wiped out & becaus i was lucky enough to be born & live a pretty good life, i want to help others to live one too.
lender.occupational_info: as i am retired, i will describe what i do now. i volunteer for my town, work with a local sustainability group to lessen my carbon footprint, and for fun i knit, hike, swim, do yoga, snowshoe and enjoy nature.

lender.name: Hillary
lender.loan_because: it seems to be a small, bureaucracy-free way to make a real difference to an entrepreneur.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I believe that providing a modest amount of \"seed funding\" that eventually translates into financial self-sufficiency is a powerful and effective way of transforming lives.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money to support scholarship aid and curricular initiatives at Brown University.

lender.name: Farley
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to me

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: I feel people need a boost in life, and if I can help, then I am happy to.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop special events for a local college, which will eventually receive donations from people.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans change the lives of people who want to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupational_info: Own and operate an advertising agency. Business is growing and we have reached over a million dollars in revenue!

lender.name: John M.
lender.occupational_info: We try to make things better following this motto "We don't make the products you use, we make the products you use better".

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can. It's amazing how only a few dollars can make such a difference in the lives of others. These loans are on behalf of my family: my husband Ken, my nine-year-old daughter Maya and my seven-year-old son Liam.
lender.occupational_info: Above all, I am a proud and busy mom. I also do a lot of writing and communications strategy for a large telecommunications company in Canada.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am an equal opportunity capitalist.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: In Canada we have easy access to education which is what made it possible for me to become financially successful and I want to share my good fortune with others.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance, and to loan money to people who are working hard, to hopefully make their lives a little easier, or give more hope, is a good thing. I wish I had a million dollars to give away.
lender.occupational_info: I buy a lot of things, some big, some little, from sheets of steel to nuts and bolts, that the production workers make into fancy metal cabinets to sell.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than me and because I like the idea of people working to pay back a loan
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve problems

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I know the power of small business. Maybe some of these people can borrow my money to take their small business and transform it into a big business, employing more people than just themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a travel agent. I work for a company which sells travel packages to clients. Most recently we have focused mostly on the carribean, however, durring the summer, we will arrange more packages for Europe.

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of small business
lender.occupational_info: semi-retired businessman/investor.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I study how life works on a REALLY SMALL scale.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: My uncle opened an account for me so I can help other people in the world.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: It\'s great to help an individual and know that a small amount of money can have a big impact on a family\'s life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people heal and make art to help keep people healthy by allowing them to relax.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for all the help I've received in my life. The generosity of many, many people has made it possible for me to become self-supporting. I hope to give to others what has been given to me so freely.
lender.occupational_info: I promote beauty products for a French cosmetics company.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: We should try to share with others - no matter where they are.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can, and I like being able to help people improve the economic situation for themselves and their children.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: My mom mentioned to me that she had seen this organization on the news and started to spread the word. How could someone turn down such a great way to help people!!??
lender.occupational_info: I work in Plant Breeding. I test new canola varieties to sell to farmers in hopes it will help their profitability.

lender.name: Egon
lender.loan_because: Like to see all funds go direct instead of being used in administration.
lender.occupational_info: Involved in food ingredients distribution, specializing in dairy processing (cheese, butter, yogurt, kefir and other cultured products).

lender.name: joseph
lender.loan_because: everybody starts somewhere.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me to achieve my goals and dreams. I would like to honor these good people by following their example.

lender.name: andre
lender.loan_because: I\'m rich in so many ways besides money.
lender.occupational_info: I fix airplanes....but my best work are my kids.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people pay the lowest income taxes allowed by law.

lender.name: James, Carolyn & Cooper
lender.loan_because: We hope that we can make the difference in the life of someone.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be successful!
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant who helps businesses/people become more successful.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I loan.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial Attorney that assist others in building companies, or otherwise causing their dreams to become a reality.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it\'s a way to help others that does not create dependencies, but rather helps people to become independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large computer company (Sun Microsystems): I show people how to use tools to develop new computer applications.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I have two beautiful children
lender.occupational_info: I put together corporate presentations and pitchbooks

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a teacher.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I can. Because there is a need. Because they are my neighbours.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and youth who have learning difficulties. I give them the skills they need to help themselves become better learners.

lender.name: Sandra and Steve
lender.loan_because: I think that this is the best use of the internet yet!! To be able to share with others in such an immediate and personal way is a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: We are both high school teachers- Sandra teaches Grade 10-12 Social Studies (mostly Geography) and Steve is a literacy specialist.

lender.name: the Wandio/Murrays
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate; and we need to share that good fortune. It costs so little to make such a big difference in these lives.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I teach English literature to university students. My son and daughter are students.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that the world\'s wealth is un-evenly balanced and I\'d like to contribute to evening it out.
lender.occupational_info: I help to make sure development happens in the most environmentally friendly way possible by doing spatial analysis and making maps.

lender.name: Tristan and Sabine
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the same opportunities in their life that we have had in ours.

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: It\'s simplicity.\r\nIt\'s sustainable.\r\nIt\'s significant.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to international students at Concordia University.

lender.name: Marisol, David y Emilio
lender.occupation: Grad Student, Teacher and Little One

lender.name: Dark Alley Dan
lender.loan_because: I'm a Libertarian. Counting on government to do anything productive is like waiting for the Tooth Fairy to pay your rent. I can't travel from place to place loaning folks money. Kiva's the next best thing.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I have a lot of respect for someone with the guts and determination to start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I sell services that help protect buyers and sellers in real estate transactions.

lender.name: MARCIA
lender.loan_because: The world is a small place in a large space - where we are truly "one".
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired scientist. I used to spend a lot of time looking into a microscope. Now I spend time enjoying the world and writing about it.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: it makes a real difference in the hands of those who can use the funds. Re-lending allows the funds to continue to work around the world.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: you only have one life. do what you should.
lender.occupational_info: i help people communicate

lender.name: Randy & Paula
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help people make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: Previously I lost a job and had to sell many of my belongings to buy food and other necessities until government assistance could help. Now I am doing well in a new job and I want to help someone else in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital where I test blood and other body fluids to help physicians diagnose disease in patients or so that patients in need of blood transfusions get safe blood.

lender.name: Josh & Kate
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate
lender.occupational_info: We help communities be healthy

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I\'d like to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a designer of tableware and table linens, but I used to be a biologist at a museum in San Francisco. I also teach a college course that I developed called \"Ecology and Production.\" It introduces design students to the environmental impacts of products and ways to design more sustainably. The photo is of me and my Mom from the 1970s.

lender.name: Judy & Dick
lender.loan_because: I want to give a hand up not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the finances and accounting of our housebuilding business

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I was always lucky in life

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Other people have been good enough to lend money to me and it has helped me a lot, so if I can help someone else I would like to.
lender.occupational_info: I look after a network of computers for a company.

lender.name: Rodney
lender.loan_because: we have so much and can support others that need help.

lender.name: samantha + adrian
lender.loan_because: we care + support small businesses and those who dream

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: In tribute to lost family and friends.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to give a hand up to people who are working with dignity, personal integrity and perserverance to provide for their families. I am pleased to be in a position to partner and connect across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find the connection between heart and mind, learn techniques to manage their stress, resolve problems, gain inner peace and bring more joy to their lives.

lender.name: The Proposal Guy
lender.loan_because: I believe that a loan with reasonable terms is far more motivating than a grant.
lender.occupational_info: I assist companies in winning government business.

lender.name: J. Phillips
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone follow their dreams....
lender.occupational_info: Emergency Medicine Doctor

lender.name: jeanne
lender.loan_because: I like helping people!

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I have travelled a lot around the world, and have seen how difficult life is for many people. I don\'t make a lot of money, but I would like to share what I do have with others, and help them to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant district attorney in Cambridge, Massachusetts. I handle only criminal appeals. My job is to represent the people of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts before the Appeals Court and Supreme Judicial Court.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: We have so much and small loans can have a big impact. Success to people everywhere in the world makes the world a smaller and safer place for everyone.

lender.name: SarahMonster
lender.loan_because: I love to support those throughout the world who are making the effort to control their own lives by running a business.
lender.occupational_info: My work pays my bills. My love is learning.

lender.name: Wilson
lender.loan_because: We believe people can be empowered with the right resources. Empowering people and helping them achieve independence is one of the greatest things we can do for another human being. As the saying goes: If you give someone a fish, they can eat for a day. If you teach them how to fish, they can eat for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: We teach managers how to become leaders.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: This is such a personal way to act globally. My late husband, pictured, believed gratitude was the hallmark of a life and there is no greater act of gratitude than to give.
lender.occupational_info: In my community I work with volunteers to identify ways to solve community problems and then raise funds for those solutions. Much of what I do connects ideas and people.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I think it's the right thing.
lender.occupational_info: I write songs and sing them for people.

lender.name: Leonardo Duran
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to not have to worry about food, shelter and health care. I want to share some of that fortune with those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a professional freelance translator.

lender.name: David & Helen
lender.loan_because: People need more little bits of help from more places!
lender.occupational_info: I create software that helps people use speech recognition and translation systems.

lender.name: Yonas & Semira
lender.loan_because: desire to make a positive impact on others and contribute to making our world better.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help in a small way.

lender.name: Doug and Laura
lender.loan_because: We can. We have more than enough to meet our own material needs and wants, and are glad to share.
lender.occupational_info: Laura is a doctor. She evaluates patients applying for government relief. Doug is an accountant, helping individuals and businesses manage their money, and prepare and pay their taxes properly.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have a fortunate life and want to give back to those in need.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help other people directly.

lender.name: helen
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping other small business- especially women owned business directly. Kiva gives me that opportunity to DIRECTLY affect soemone who- like me- is in business for herself and does not have the option option of banks and business loans. I beleive if we all put out a hand to each other- we WILL change the world and how it works by caring for and supporting each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to heal pain , both emotional and physical, by working on the pain in their bodis in a caring and loving way. I also work with hospice ( people who are dying) and cancer sufferers who need caring touch and healing.

lender.name: Monique & Jim & kids
lender.loan_because: I can change someone's life with this simple loan.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I\'ve been givin the opportunity to make good money here in Canada, and it would be nice to help another person to get that chance.
lender.occupational_info: I study hard for school, but I am currently working up in Northern Canada where it is between -30 and -45 for lots of the year (even colder sometimes- with wind in the -50\'s and -60\'s, Celsius. I live in a camp, with a prison crossed with a college dorm atmosphere.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I don\'t have much myself in the way of funds, but I have a great family and they are all doing well. I wanted to give a little something to others who have nothing. Just my little effort to make this a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired school teacher. I had to retired from work because I am handicapped and can no longer work. Before I became a school teacher, I was a sailor, like my father and my grandfather before me.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I like it. Its that simple!
lender.occupational_info: Im teaching English abroad because I like to learn about different cultures. Ill be in Chile until December of 2009.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I\'ve been fortunate enough to travel to 50 countries including many in the developing world and the experience has made me aware of how lucky I am to live in Canada and to be able to travel. I have gained a lot from local people I\'ve met on my travels and I thus feel the desire to give back. I love the concept of Kiva as it helps people to help themselves and I know that 100% of my loan goes to the recipient.

lender.name: Doctor Schmidt
lender.loan_because:
Our father, Dr. John R. Schmidt (1911-2003) committed his entire life to the health and wellbeing of Paraguayans. He and his wife Clara (a nurse) went to Paraguay in the early 1940s and remained until his death in 2003. They founded numerous hospitals in Paraguay (in the Chaco as well as in east Paraguay), the most famous of which is the leprosy hospital at Km. 81, called Hospital Menonita.
As a result of this linkage to the country, we care deeply about giving people in Paraguay a chance who are highly motivated, but lack the resources. If you are interested in contacting us regarding similar interests in Paraguay, please contact us at the following e-mail address: marlena.fiol@cudenver.edu

lender.name: Anthony Clarke
lender.loan_because: I want to try to make a difference, and support the country I was bought up in.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I'm continuously blessed, and I want to share those blessings to others.
lender.occupational_info: I specializes in care strategies for clientele living in Long Term Care & Alzheimers Care facilities. I write programming guides for senior care and creative non-fiction books.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: its my responsibility as a human being.

lender.name: Robert & Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: We live in a Global Village, it's important for us to recognize the needs of others beyond our community.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: To connect with the people who need the money and watch their success stories unfold.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of 2 boys.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate and it is my turn to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that there are no mistakes in college textbooks. I'm also an ordained priest in the Independent Catholic Christian Church.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: People in developing/underdeveloped countries deserve the right of self determination that many in the West enjoy as a privilege.
lender.occupational_info: energy efficiency and industrial engineer

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I want to give a little, as I am so fortunate.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to feel a direct one-to-one connection while helping our global brothers & sisters. It's amazing how a small amount of my cash can be used repeatedly: loaned, repaid and re-loaned again, producing multiple benefits to a variety of people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am on a disability pension and do volunteer work.

lender.name: Butterfly
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: The HoHoHo Project
lender.loan_because: We are doing this as an alternative to exchanging Christmas gifts. We hope to share our good fortune with others, during the holiday season, and throughout the year.
lender.occupational_info:
Jackie & Don are from Qualicum Bay, BC. Michele & Brian reside in Edmonton, AL. Debbie, Rob and Zoe live in Port Alberni, BC. Nicole and James (Skip) are also from Port Alberni, BC. Canada
.

lender.name: Ru__
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I respect and want to help people who are trying to improve their lives through hard work.

lender.name: Oana
lender.loan_because: I appreciate people that want to do something and are not just beggars or thieves.
lender.occupational_info: I think these people need support and I am willing to try to help them. I prefer people that are producers, instead of people that just do commerce or speculate.

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: we need to help people with their solutions to their problems. We have in the past tried to give them our solutions - that is demeaning, and doesn't work.

lender.name: Mattia and Marilena
lender.loan_because: We want to share a bit of what we have with others. Maybe this can made someone else life a little bit better...
